machine_end_gcode:
G92 E0                      ; Reset extruder
G1 E-2 F1800                ; Retract a little
G91                         ; Relative positioning
G1 Z10 F3000                ; Lift Z by 10mm
G90                         ; Back to absolute positioning
G1 X5 Y220 F6000            ; Park at front-left (change if you prefer back-right)
M106 S0                     ; Turn off part cooling fan
M104 S0                     ; Turn off hotend
M140 S0                     ; Turn off bed
machine_start_gcode:
G90             ; absolute positioning
G21             ; millimeters
M83             ; relative extrusion

SMART_PARK

M104 S220       ; set extruder temp
M140 S55        ; set bed temp
M190 S55        ; wait for bed
M109 S220       ; wait for extruder

G92 E0          ; reset extrusion distance
M106 S0         ; fan off

LINE_PURGE
name: MyKlipper 0.4 nozzle - Changed start Gcode
